test_case: Verify that users can upload a JPG, PNG, or GIF file successfully.
Check that the preview is displayed before saving.
Ensure that file size validation prevents uploads over 5MB.
Confirm that an error message appears for unsupported file formats.
Validate that users can remove an uploaded profile picture.
Ensure that users can log in with valid credentials.
Verify that incorrect passwords show an error message.
Check that 'Remember Me' functionality persists login sessions.
Ensure that locked accounts cannot log in.
Verify that users can register with valid details.
Ensure that password strength validation is enforced.
Check that duplicate email registration is prevented.
Verify that the dashboard loads correctly after login.
Ensure that widgets on the dashboard are displayed properly.
Check that the user statistics update in real-time.
Validate that users can update their account settings.
Ensure that users can change their password.
Check that email notifications can be toggled on/off.
Ensure that users can search using keywords.
Verify that search results are relevant.
Check that no results message appears when no matches are found.
Ensure that large file uploads are restricted.
Verify that uploaded files are scanned for viruses.
Check that users can delete uploaded files.
Verify that users receive notifications for new messages.
Ensure that notifications are displayed in real-time.
Check that users can mark notifications as read.
Ensure that users can complete purchases successfully.
Verify that incorrect card details result in an error.
Check that order summaries display accurate information.
